../implementation_interface/ev_fontable_i.xmlEV_FONTABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Access
f_line../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_lineline (i: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseSTRING_32 -- Result is content of the ith line. require valid_line: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (i) deferred ensure result_not_void: Result /= Void end
feature -- Status report
f_has_word_wrapping../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_has_word_wrappinghas_word_wrapping: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is word wrapping enabled? -- If enabled, lines that are too long to be displayed -- in Current will be wrapped onto new lines. -- If disabled, a horizontal scroll bar will be displayed -- and lines will not be wrapped. deferred end
f_current_line_number../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_current_line_numbercurrent_line_number: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Resultis number of line containing cursor. deferred ensure valid_line_index: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (Result) end
f_line_count../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_line_countline_count: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Number of lines of text in Current. deferred ensure result_greater_zero: Result > 0 end
f_first_visible_line../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_first_visible_linefirst_visible_line: FalseINTEGER_32 -- First visible line current being displayed. deferred ensure valid_line_index: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (Result) end
f_first_position_from_line_number../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_first_position_from_line_numberfirst_position_from_line_number (i: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Position of the first character on the i-th line. require valid_line: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (i) deferred ensure valid_caret_position: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_valid_caret_positionvalid_caret_position (i) end
f_last_position_from_line_number../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_last_position_from_line_numberlast_position_from_line_number (i: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Position of the last character on the i-th line. require valid_line: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (i) deferred ensure valid_caret_position: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_valid_caret_positionvalid_caret_position (i) end
f_line_number_from_position../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_line_number_from_positionline_number_from_position (i: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Line containing caret position i. require valid_caret_position: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_component_i.xml#f_valid_caret_positionvalid_caret_position (i) deferred ensure valid_line_number: Result >= 1 and Result <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_line_countline_count end
feature -- Basic operation
f_enable_word_wrapping../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_enable_word_wrappingenable_word_wrapping -- Ensure has_word_wrap is True. deferred ensure word_wrapping_enabled: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_has_word_wrappinghas_word_wrapping end
f_disable_word_wrapping../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_disable_word_wrappingdisable_word_wrapping -- Ensure has_word_wrap is False. deferred ensure word_wrapping_disabled: not ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_has_word_wrappinghas_word_wrapping end
f_search../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_searchsearch (str: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL; start: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseINTEGER_32 -- Position of first occurrence of str at or after start; -- 0 if none. require valid_string: str /= Void do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext.Falsesubstring_index (str.Falseas_string_32, start) end
f_scroll_to_line../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_scroll_to_linescroll_to_line (i: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Ensure that line i is visible in Current. require valid_line_index: ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (i) deferred end
f_scroll_to_end../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_scroll_to_endscroll_to_end -- Ensure that the last line is visible in Current. deferred end

f_valid_line_index../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_valid_line_indexvalid_line_index (i: FalseINTEGER_32): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is i a valid line index? do Result := i > 0 and i <= ../implementation_interface/ev_text_i.xml#f_line_countline_count end
